title: Golden Spike National Historic Site: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education        If you are a teacher and would like your class to participate in a field trip to Golden Spike NHS please call to make arrangements at least two weeks prior to your anticipated visit. One of the Park Rangers overseeing this program can be reached at 435-471-2209 ext. 29.    Â    SCHOOL GROUP RESERVATIONS. To make reservations for a school field trip please click on the links to download your application for fee waiver to help in the process of arranging your field trip. Fee Waiver Application Easy Steps to Make a Reservation
